Intuitive course navigation for diverse learners
Students struggled to find relevant courses and track their progress. The platform had poor accessibility and didn't accommodate different learning styles.
We created a personalized dashboard with clear course categorization, progress tracking, and accessibility features. The design system ensured consistency across all learning modules.
An accessible learning platform with intuitive navigation and personalized course recommendations for diverse learners.

Community-driven time exchange platform connecting neighbors for mutual support

Modern urban communities face isolation despite physical proximity. People need help with daily tasks but hesitate to ask neighbors due to social barriers. Traditional volunteer systems lack reciprocity, making sustainable community support difficult. Elderly residents who can't contribute physically feel excluded from community networks.

We designed Thai Time Bank as a mobile platform that transforms time into currency for community exchange. The system uses 'time credits' (1 hour = 60 credits) to facilitate neighbor-to-neighbor help. Key innovations include family credit pooling for elderly care, progressive radius matching (5km → 10km → 15km) for urgent requests, and a 'neighbor endorsement chain' where members can amplify requests they can't fulfill themselves. The platform mimics real-world neighbor interactions with staged information disclosure and grace periods for commitment.
Launched with 1,000+ quality members focused on mutual aid mindset
Family credit system enables elderly participation without physical contribution
Priority escalation ensures no request goes unanswered
Community manager oversight for high-priority and disputed cases
Built-in trust system through verified identities and review ratings
A time-banking platform that rebuilds community connections by enabling neighbors to exchange help using time as currency, creating sustainable mutual support networks in urban Thailand.
A time-banking platform that rebuilds community connections by enabling neighbors to exchange help using time as currency, creating sustainable mutual support networks in urban Thailand.
Streamlined checkout reduced cart abandonment by 40%
High cart abandonment rates and complex checkout process were costing the business significant revenue. Users reported confusion about shipping options and payment methods.
We simplified the checkout to a single-page flow, added guest checkout, and made shipping costs transparent upfront. Every element was tested with real users.
An optimized e-commerce checkout experience that significantly improved conversion rates and customer satisfaction.
An optimized e-commerce checkout experience that significantly improved conversion rates and customer satisfaction.
The existing patient portal had a 60% abandonment rate during appointment booking. Users found the process confusing with too many steps and unclear navigation.
We redesigned the entire booking flow with clear visual hierarchy, reduced steps from 7 to 3, and added progress indicators. User testing validated every decision.
A streamlined patient portal that simplified appointment booking and reduced abandonment rates significantly.

Cultural Heritage Personalized Tour. And Town History Database
GPS-guided walking tours through Bangkok's Chinatown and heritage sites

Tourists visiting Bangkok's cultural sites struggled with navigation, missed important landmarks, and lacked context about the historical significance of locations. Traditional tour guides were expensive and inflexible.

We designed Walk Thailand as a GPS-guided walking tour app that acts as a personal guide. The app provides turn-by-turn navigation, tells stories about history and culture at each location, and allows users to explore at their own pace. Features include route planning, points of interest, and multilingual content.
Featured in Thai Health Promotion Foundation partnership
Covers multiple heritage areas including Samphanthawong and Na Kluea
Integrated with local festivals and community events
Easy planning with rest stops and restaurant recommendations
A GPS-guided cultural walking tour application for exploring Bangkok's heritage sites, community areas, and local festivals.
A GPS-guided cultural walking tour application for exploring Bangkok’s heritage sites, community areas, and local festivals.
